imgArray.name: The Backlot
imgArray.description: The Backlot: parking space available for summer residents & guests throughout summer

imgArray.name: The Chapter Room
imgArray.description: This is the room where it all happens, the chapter room.  During the day it's a great place to watch tv or talk with friends.  At night, a number of our social events are hosted here

imgArray.name: View of the Charles
imgArray.description: From our roofdeck, you get one of the best views of the Charles you can find in Boston!  A great place for watching the 4th of July fireworks or just hanging out

imgArray.name: The Dining Room
imgArray.description: During the semester, this is where the brothers sit down together for dinner.  This is also where eating happens for numerous social events.

imgArray.name: The Kitchen
imgArray.description: Restaurant-Grade kitchen downstairs.  During the semester a chef cooks dinner, but the brothers are free to use the kitchen to make their own meals as well.

imgArray.name: The Pool Room
imgArray.description: There's nothing like a classic game of Billiards with friends

imgArray.name: Roofdeck facing Boston
imgArray.description: Our roofdeck is great for BBQ's throughout the summer, great place to celebrate the 4th of July

imgArray.name: Roofdeck facing Cambridge
imgArray.description: Our roofdeck swing, a nice place to sit down and relax to a beautiful view of the Charles

imgArray.name: Second floor Double
imgArray.description: One of our doubles on the second floor.  All rooms come fully furnished, lofted beds

imgArray.name: Stairs to Foyer
imgArray.description: View of our stairs leading to the ground floor

imgArray.name: The Veg Patch
imgArray.description: Second floor triple with a great view of the Charles
